title: Dark Elves
description: Dark elves are as beautiful as elves, the only difference being that they have dark skin and malevolent eyes. They usually dwell in deserts and wield dark and blood magic, favoring daggers as weapons to strike with precision and deadly intent.

title: Dragons
description: Dragons are shapeshifters of unmatched power, they are a reptilian race with massive muscular bodies covered in thick scales. They bare wings, razor sharp claws, and large fangs like swords. They wield potent magic beyond any other beingâ€™s capability.
